
##### Available models: 

DD1 

$$ \lambda_t = \lambda_0 + \beta N_t, \qquad \mu_t = \mu_0 $$

EDD

$$ log(\lambda_t) = \lambda_0 + \beta N_t, \qquad \mu_t = \mu_0 $$

PD

$$ \lambda_t = \lambda_0 + \beta P_t, \qquad \mu_t = \mu_0 $$

EDD

$$ log(\lambda_t) = \lambda_0 + \beta P_t, \qquad \mu_t = \mu_0 $$
GDDX

$$ \lambda_t = \lambda_0N_t^{-\beta}, \qquad \mu_t = \mu_0 $$


DD2 

$$ \lambda_t = \lambda_0\left(1 - \frac{N_t}{K}\right), \qquad \mu_t = \mu_0 $$


PD2 

$$ \lambda_t = \lambda_0\left(1 - \frac{P_t}{K}\right), \qquad \mu_t = \mu_0 $$


RD1

$$ \lambda_t = \lambda_0\left(1 - \frac{N_t/P_t}{K}\right), \qquad \mu_t = \mu_0 $$

RD2

$$ \lambda_t = \lambda_0\left(1 - \frac{P_t/N_t}{K}\right), \qquad \mu_t = \mu_0 $$
